attributes.action: make all family courts pay back the parents money when the system fails.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The family courts delay justice in the family courts and cases last for years.

The foundation of ENGLISH law which we use today exsists because of the 12 centary ( the manga carta )

which when translated says

that no one will sell deny or delay the right of civil or political justice..

This was impossed on the crown and the manga carta made...

so this petition is so that the prime minister can abide by the law for a change!!!!
